body_html: I did have sigmoid at the end. It didn't hold because the inputs (or outputs from the network) have nan. I have attached a version that does work by commenting out the KL loss, despite the error comes from BCE loss.
body_text: I did have sigmoid at the end. It didn't hold because the inputs (or outputs from the network) have nan. I have attached a version that does work by commenting out the KL loss, despite the error comes from BCE loss.
body: I did have sigmoid at the end. It didn't hold because the inputs (or outputs from the network) have nan. I have attached a version that *does* work by commenting out the KL loss, despite the error comes from BCE loss.
